## FAQ - Common Questions

### What button variants are available in GDS?

GDS provides **6 button variants**:

1. **Primary** - Main call-to-action, filled Neptune blue (#024DDF)
2. **Secondary** - Alternative actions, outline style with Neptune border
3. **Tertiary** - Low-emphasis actions, text-only with hover background
4. **Ghost** - Minimal style, transparent with subtle hover
5. **Transaction** - For purchase/payment actions, uses Earth green (#01A469)
6. **Inverse** - For dark backgrounds, white text/border

**Button sizes:** Small, Medium (default), Large

**Tailwind for Primary Button:**
```html
<button class="inline-flex items-center justify-center gap-2 px-4 py-2.5 bg-[#024DDF] text-white font-semibold rounded-lg hover:bg-[#0141B8] focus:ring-2 focus:ring-offset-2 disabled:bg-[#D6D6D6] disabled:cursor-not-allowed">
  Button Label
</button>
```

## Component Quick Reference

Quick lookup for all major components:

### Button
- **Variants:** `primary`, `secondary`, `tertiary`, `transaction`, `ghost`, `inverse`
- **Code prop:** `colorVariant="primary"`
- **Figma:** Node 34410:13185
- **Tailwind:** `bg-[#024DDF] text-white font-semibold rounded-lg`

### InputField
- **States:** default, focus, error, disabled
- **Code:** `<InputField label="..." error="..." />`
- **Tailwind:** `border border-[#D6D6D6] rounded-lg focus:ring-[#024DDF]`

### Checkbox
- **States:** unchecked, checked, indeterminate, disabled
- **Code:** `<Checkbox checked={true} onChange={...} />`

### Modal
- **Props:** `isOpen`, `onClose`, `title`, `size`
- **Code:** `<Modal isOpen={open} onClose={handleClose}>...</Modal>`
- **Tailwind:** `fixed inset-0 z-50 bg-black/50`

### Toast
- **Variants:** info, success, warning, error
- **Code:** `<Toast variant="success" message="..." />`

### AlertBox
- **Variants:** info, success, warning, error
- **Code:** `<AlertBox variant="error">Message</AlertBox>`
- **Tailwind:** `bg-[#EB0000]/10 text-[#EB0000]` (error)

### Badge
- **Variants:** default, success, warning, error
- **Tailwind:** `px-2 py-1 text-xs font-medium rounded-full`

### LoadingSpinner
- **Sizes:** small, medium, large
- **Code:** `<LoadingSpinner size="medium" />`

### Accordion
- **Props:** `items`, `allowMultiple`, `defaultExpanded`
- **Code:** `<Accordion items={[{title, content}]} />`

### Stepper
- **Props:** `steps`, `currentStep`, `orientation`
- **Code:** `<Stepper steps={steps} currentStep={2} />`

## Additional FAQ

### How do I create a form?
Combine these components:
```tsx
<InputField label="Email" type="email" />
<InputField label="Password" type="password" />
<Checkbox label="Remember me" />
<Button variant="primary">Submit</Button>
```

### How do I show loading state?
Use `LoadingSpinner` for full-page loading, `Skeleton` for content placeholders, or Button's `isLoading` prop:
```tsx
<Button isLoading>Processing...</Button>
<LoadingSpinner size="large" />
<Skeleton width="100%" height="20px" />
```

### What's the difference between Modal and SidePanel?
- **Modal:** Centered overlay, blocks interaction, for confirmations/forms
- **SidePanel:** Slides from edge, for navigation/filters/details

### How do I show feedback messages?
- **Toast:** Temporary notifications (auto-dismiss)
- **AlertBox:** Persistent inline messages
- **ErrorMessage/SuccessMessage:** Form field feedback

### How do I use icons with buttons?
```tsx
<Button icon={<PlusIcon />} iconPosition="left">Add Item</Button>
<CircleButton icon={<CloseIcon />} /> // Icon-only
<SquareButton icon={<MenuIcon />} /> // Icon-only square
```

## Quick Copy-Paste Code

### Primary Button
```html
<button class="inline-flex items-center justify-center gap-2 px-4 py-2.5 bg-[#024DDF] text-white font-semibold rounded-lg hover:bg-[#0141B8] focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#024DDF] focus:ring-offset-2 transition-colors">
  Button
</button>
```

### Secondary Button
```html
<button class="inline-flex items-center justify-center gap-2 px-4 py-2.5 border-2 border-[#024DDF] text-[#024DDF] font-semibold rounded-lg hover:bg-[#024DDF] hover:text-white transition-colors">
  Secondary
</button>
```

### Input Field
```html
<input type="text" class="w-full px-4 py-3 border border-[#D6D6D6] rounded-lg focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#024DDF] focus:border-transparent placeholder:text-[#949494]" placeholder="Enter text..." />
```

### Card
```html
<div class="p-6 bg-white rounded-xl shadow-md border border-[#D6D6D6]">
  <h3 class="text-lg font-semibold text-[#121212]">Title</h3>
  <p class="mt-2 text-[#646464]">Content</p>
</div>
```

### Badge
```html
<span class="inline-flex items-center px-2 py-1 text-xs font-medium rounded-full bg-[#024DDF] text-white">Badge</span>
```

### Alert (Success)
```html
<div class="flex items-center gap-3 p-4 rounded-lg bg-[#01A469]/10 text-[#01A469]">
  <span>✓</span><p>Success message</p>
</div>
```

### Alert (Error)
```html
<div class="flex items-center gap-3 p-4 rounded-lg bg-[#EB0000]/10 text-[#EB0000]">
  <span>⚠</span><p>Error message</p>
</div>
```

### Modal
```html
<div class="fixed inset-0 z-50 flex items-center justify-center bg-black/50">
  <div class="w-full max-w-md p-6 bg-white rounded-xl shadow-xl">
    <h2 class="text-xl font-semibold">Title</h2>
    <p class="mt-4 text-[#646464]">Content</p>
    <div class="flex justify-end gap-3 mt-6">
      <button class="px-4 py-2 text-[#646464]">Cancel</button>
      <button class="px-4 py-2 bg-[#024DDF] text-white rounded-lg">Confirm</button>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>
```
